languages.text: The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short range once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
[draft] A marvellous compact weapon in a form of a ring allows to fire a "Inferno Pistol pattern" in a short {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} once per combat.
(Attack Inferno Pistol pattern
Distance 5, Damage 10-14, Pen 40)
The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> damage and has 40% armour penetration.

The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short range once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short range once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

languages.text: 着用者は1戦闘につき1回、近{g|Encyclopedia:Range}距離{/g}でインフェルノ・ピストル射撃を行うことができる。この攻撃は<u>（10 ～14までの）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、40%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ。
languages.original_text: The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 着用者は1戦闘につき1回、近{g|Encyclopedia:Range}距離{/g}でインフェルノ・ピストル射撃を行うことができる。この攻撃は<u>（10 ～14まで）</u>のダメージを与え、40％のアーマー貫通を持つ。

languages.text: 装备者每场战斗中可以使用狱火手枪进行一次短程射击{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}。此次射击造成<u>（10到14）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，此次攻击获得40%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。
languages.original_text: The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者每场战斗中可以使用狱火手枪进行一次短程射击。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}此次射击造成<u>（10到14）</u>点伤害，此次攻击获得40%护甲穿透。

languages.text: El portador puede usar un disparo de pistola inferno a corto alcance una vez por combate. El disparo inflige <u>(de 10 a 14)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y tiene un 40 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short range once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El portador puede usar un disparo de pistola inferno a corto {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} una vez por combate. El disparo inflige <u>(de 10 a 14)</u> de daño y tiene un 40 % de penetración de armadura.

languages.text: Der Träger kann einmal pro Kampf auf kurze {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Distanz{/g} einen Infernopistolenschuss abfeuern. Dieser Schuss verursacht <u>(10 bis 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} bei 40 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short range once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger kann einmal pro Kampf auf kurze {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Distanz{/g} einen Infernopistolenschuss. Dieser Schuss fügt <u>(von 10 bis 14)</u> Schaden bei 40 % Rüstungsdurchdringung zu.

languages.text: Une fois par combat, l'utilisateur peut utiliser un pistolet Inferno pour effectuer un tir à courte portée. Ce tir inflige <u>(10 à 14)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, avec une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de 40 %.
languages.original_text: The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short range once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Une fois par combat, l'utilisateur peut utiliser un pistolet Inferno pour effectuer un tir à courte {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g}. Ce tir inflige <u>(10 à 14)</u> points de dégâts, avec une pénétration d'armure de 40 %.

languages.text: Один раз за бой из пистолета "Инферно" можно выстрелить на малой дальности. Этот выстрел наносит <u>(от 10 до 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и обладает {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 40%.
languages.original_text: The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short range once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Один раз за бой из пистолета "Инферно" можно выстрелить на малой {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дальности{/g}. Этот выстрел наносит <u>(от 10 до 14)</u> урона и обладает пробитием брони 40%.
